title: The Best and Worst Things About Conventions - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 23)
description:

For a total of $75 off your first 3 boxes visit greenchef.us/kinda75

Nick, Andy, and Joey talk about their experiences at conventions!

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
